testRemovalOfUnusedInParameter.circuit: module main(in a(16), out b(16)) b += 0

testRemovalOfUnusedOutParameter.circuit: module main(out a(16), out b(16)) b += 0

testRemovalOfUnusedInoutParameter.circuit: module main(inout a(16), out b(16)) b += 0

testRemovalOfUnusedWireLocal.circuit: module main(out b(16)) wire a(16) b += 0

testRemovalOfUnusedStateLocal.circuit: module main(out b(16)) state a(16) b += 0

testRemovalOfUnusedModule.circuit: module double(in a(16), out b(16)) b += (a << 1) module main(out b(16)) b += 1

testRemovalOfUnusedModuleParametersAlsoD.circuit: module double(in a(16), out b(16)) skip module main(out b(16)) b += 1

testAttemptedRemovalOfTopLevelModuleWill.circuit: module main(out b(16)) b += 1 module test(in a(16)) skip
